root.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow 6: Patriots
root.description: In Rainbow 6: Patriots, Team Rainbow will go up against a domestic revolutionary force known as the "True Patriots," who believe the American government is no longer fit to rule the nation.The game will feature moral decisions as well as new co-op and multiplayer modes.First trailers were release in 2011. However, the game went unheard of after several members of the development team were removed from the project. After much speculation around the game being cancelled, at E3 2013 Ubisoft confirmed that the title would be released for next-generation consoles, as well as current-gen consoles, pushing the release date to 2014.
